CustomField.description: Used to define whether the Child Work Type is either a "Prerequisite" to a reinstatement job or a sub "Work Step" of a specific Reinstatement Parent Work Type. This is for example used in the Screen Flow "MSN - Work Order - Create Required Reinstatement Jobs" to determine which Service Appointments and Child Work Orders need to be created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please define, whether the Child Work Type is either a "Prerequisite" to a reinstatement job or a sub "Work Step" of a specific Reinstatement Parent Work Type.
CustomField.label: Reinstatement Step Type
